name: Nekotarou's adventure
description:
A platformer basing on a mixture of  Japanese mythologies Help Nekotarou to  save his people by finding and beating the Oni. I did not have time to fully finish it sadly, so there are several bugs left inside.

Controls:

Left+Right arrow keys to move around

Space to jump, press space twice to double jump

C to dash

X to attack

You can also jump onto walls.
